description: Try our easy to follow Pork Schnitzel With Quick Slaw recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pork Schnitzel With Quick Slaw Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, combine slaw and dressing from the packet), mint and chilli in a bowl. Season. Divide potato, schnitzels and slaw among plates. Serve with lemon wedges.
